The article published by The Defender: an outlet of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s Children's Health Defense, intimates a connection between Hank Aaron's death and the COVID-19 vaccine he received.
Hank Aaron received the COVID: 19 vaccine on January 5, 2021, at the Morehouse Healthcare Clinic, part of the Morehouse School of Medicine.
Morehouse School of Medicine released a: s death was unrelated to the COVID-19 vaccine and that he did not experience any side effects from the immunization.
